data.description: Perl bindings for Java Swing GUI
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
For over a year Inline::Java has allowed us to build Perl
    applications with Java Swing front ends. Java::Swing is a set of
    bindings that make doing this easier. It is in the same spirit as
    the tk and gtk binding modules. Among the benefits is event handling
    through Perl code reference callbacks instead of hand coded Java
    classes. Its best benefit is simplification through fewer files and
    a single language for development.
